channel.title: Special weapon emotes
channel.description: Well im using the PK Planet base and i wanna add the correct dds special, Dark bow special, and mage bow special Right now then i use the dds special it looks like a dragon longsword Right now when i use the DarkBow special it looks like flying bunnys and barrages When i use the Mage bow it shoots 2 flying maces... If anyone would like to help it would be appreciated =\

item.title: Special weapon emotes
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

maces = model fix;
dark bow = model fix;
dds = change gfx;
